description: CONF.neutron_ca_certificates_file and  CONF.cinder_ca_certificates_file's help message misspelled certificates.
title: certificates misspelled in help message for CONF options

comments.content: CONF.neutron_ca_certificates_file and  CONF.cinder_ca_certificates_file's help message misspelled certificates.

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/47295
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/fdc05963528c694dab29283d96d685c37080ccb4
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit fdc05963528c694dab29283d96d685c37080ccb4
Author: Joe Gordon <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Sep 18 17:38:31 2013 -0700

    Typo: certicates=>certificates in nova.conf
    
    The help message for cinder_ca_certificates_file and
    neutron_ca_certificates_file spelled certificates wrong.
    
    As this is user facing, we should fix it.
    
    Fixes bug 1227780
    
    Change-Id: If9372fffb655d21069c005351ebb593d8e16e056
